title: Bean and Quesillo Sauce with Zambos Plantain with Pork Rinds
ingredients: 1 bag of Zambos Plantain with Pork Rinds
instructions: Step 1. In a pot, place the cup of water and bring to a boil. Add the blended beans. Stir well.
Step 2. Add the Creole Sofrito and mix.
Step 3. Continue adding the quesillo sauce and stir gently until well combined.
Step 4. Serve with the Zambos Plantain with Pork Rinds. And enjoy!
